answerText: Molière [ or Jean-Baptiste Poquelin][10] This Molière play is about Arnolphe, a man so ignorant of women that he attempts to raise Agnes to be his wife from birth.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 14 - Finals 2 | 12 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This playwright was often in the favor of the Royal Court but his satire angered the Catholic Church. For 10 points each: [10] Name this French comic playwright who ironically died after coughing up blood on stage while acting in his play, The Imaginary Invalid.
